room_title: Escape room "Dr. Stein's Laboratory" by Escape Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: What a great time! ! The staff was awsome, they were really into it and that made it even more fun! I think this is guaranteed to be a fun night out for anyone who does it!!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Stein's Laboratory" by Escape Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: Fabulous time! I booked the entire Mad Scientist room for my daughter and her friends for her 17th bday and the had a blast! They loved the entire experience & can't wait to do it again for the next birthday!! Fun times!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Stein's Laboratory" by Escape Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: So fun!! Such an unforgettable expierence. Can't wait to go back and try another room!!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Stein's Laboratory" by Escape Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: Had such a great time tonight! Even though we did not escape! Looking fwd to the new place in the waterfront!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Stein's Laboratory" by Escape Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: Had a blast...the magnet was strong enough...Can't wait to try all the other rooms...

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Stein's Laboratory" by Escape Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: My teenage kids wanted to try it and even though we didn't get out it was a blast trying. The saying time flys when your having fun is so true. Can't wait to try the other room.

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Stein's Laboratory" by Escape Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: We got a group of 14 together and split up over both rooms. Everyone had a great time and really enjoyed the night of puzzles and teamwork. Highly recommend this to everyone!
